nodes.text: The Ondo system was a star system located within the galactic regions known as the Colonies and the Slice. It fell within the borders of the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars, a conflict between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. The system was the origin point of the Ondo Lava wine.
The Ondo system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square N-12.
